title: can't play why?
body:
i can't start playing even after log'in  why ?  

 thare something downloading do it have to be complate to play ??

replies.body: Sounds like your client is currently patching. That little progress bar where the Play button usually is will let you know how far along the patch is. Once that's done you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
oh and there wasnt Play button in the page
